title: Text Intelligence Query Parameters
description: Schema for Text Intelligence API query parameters

sentiment.description: Recognizes the sentiment throughout the text

intents.description: Recognizes speaker intent throughout the text

custom_topic.description: Custom topics you want the model to detect within your input text if present. Submit up to 100.

custom_intent.description: Custom intents you want the model to detect within your input text if present. Submit up to 100.

callback.description: URL to which we'll make the callback request

callback_method.description: HTTP method by which the callback request will be made
